body_html:
@vrv OK thanks :)

PS: as Vijay pointed out, you'll need C++ anyway to define the body of custom op, even without shape inference function

Oh yeah... I was using the py_func trick earlier, but I guess that's not a very elegant solution...

opveclib sounds really cool, thanks!

body:
@vrv OK thanks :)

> PS: as Vijay pointed out, you'll need C++ anyway to define the body of custom op, even without shape inference function

Oh yeah... I was using the [py_func](https://gist.github.com/harpone/3453185b41d8d985356cbe5e57d67342) trick earlier, but I guess that's not a very elegant solution...

opveclib sounds really cool, thanks!
